item.title: Where and How to Get ArcGIS Pro at Harvard
item.description: On your own computer If you have a PC and a Harvard Key, you can download and install ArcGIS Pro on your own computer using these instructions from the Harvard Center for Geographic Analysis (CGA). If you do not have a PC, you can: Use the Harvard Center for Geographic Analysis (CGA) guide on How to install ArcGIS Desktop or Pro on a Mac . Consider using the open-source equivalent GIS desktop software, QGIS, which is OS-independent.
